wrf-python¶

wrf-python is a package to help users working with the Weather Research and Forecasting Model (WRF-ARW) output. wrf-python includes over thirty diagnostics calculations along with various interpolation routines. When coupled with either matplotlib or PyNGL, users can create plots like this:
